snippet: To the Editor:   "California's Pied Piper of Clean Air" (Sept. 13) is misleading because it omits a significant aspect of the problem. The automobile industry entered an agreement with the California Air Resources Board to try to meet a new, extre...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: "California's Pied Piper of Clean Air" (Sept. 13) is misleading because it omits a significant aspect of the problem. The automobile industry entered an agreement with the California Air Resources Board to try to meet a new, extremely low level of emissions by gasoline-powered cars with the understanding that the state would require the oil industry to produce reformulated gasoline with a special chemical content. The oil industry agreed.

headline.main: Two-Pronged Approach in Quest for Clean Air
